meanings.definition: Intrusively enthusiastic in offering help or advice.
meanings.sent1: Her officiousness neighbor always tried to tell her how to garden.
meanings.sent2: The officiousness waiter kept interrupting their conversation to recommend dishes.
meanings.sent3: The officiousness squirrel insisted on showing the birds how to gather nuts.
meanings.sent4: His officiousness behavior at the party made him seem like a know-it-all.
meanings.sent5: The officiousness cat tried to organize the other pets' playtime.

meanings.definition: Assertive of authority in an annoyingly domineering way.
meanings.sent1: The officiousness supervisor constantly micromanaged his team's work.
meanings.sent2: Her officiousness tone made it clear she expected everyone to follow her orders.
meanings.sent3: The officiousness seagull acted like it owned the entire beach.
meanings.sent4: The officiousness storm clouds seemed to command the sky.
meanings.sent5: His officiousness attitude towards safety regulations irritated his coworkers.
